form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 LACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS HOSP PROV DOC CLIN QUIRURGICO FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) 3 30 1991 CITY Santa Clera VC COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at Cuba NAME (Last In CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX ETIENNE CILENCIUX LESPERANCE (Mo., Day, Yr.) F I certify that on the above date I examined 20 6 1900 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON 0060201462 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Tuberculosis, Not Active Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease. Not Infectic Granuloma Inguinale Syphilis, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect. Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instruction CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Reaction mm Describe findings: Not Done DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ Dr. Julian Rodriguez Reyes 22-3-91 DATE READ SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: AIDS test VDRL DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY Drs. Deline Romaro Io 2203 12-3-01 Dra. Delina Romero Loynam 12-3-20 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. 30-3-01 Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE HOSPITAL Can PROV.
